overview: A western town is being overrun and ruled by a gang of outlaws led by Bart (John Merton). Former Ranger Tim (Tim McCoy) is called out of retirement and assigned to clean up the gang. He disguises himself as a Mexican bandit, joins the gang and works from within.
tagline: TIM'S RUSE WORKS ..He poses as a bad man - and outwits the bad men who have him marked for death!
title: Two Gun Justice
